SummaryEnglish: Petit Seka is a ten-episode mini-anime series featuring characters from the mobile game 'Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE!'

1.SummaryEnglish: Leo/need attend band practice in the "SEKAI" where Hatsune Miku and the other VIRTUAL SINGERs live. On their way home after practice, Ichika and the others get hungry, so they decide to stop somewhere first...!

2.SummaryEnglish: Phoenix Wonderland is under attack by the mysterious devil Emu! To protect the peace of Phoenix Wonderland, our hero, Pegasus the Shining, stands together with Professor Ruidouji and Neneko. Nenenger V, let's move out!

3.SummaryEnglish: Together with her friends, Minori is doing her best with practices every day, but the road to become an idol is an endlessly tough one. Through Airi's hard trainings, Minori is trying to acquire her own brilliance. What kind of tomorrow will it be for MORE MORE JUMP!?

4.SummaryEnglish:
"1000 Ways To Not Be Nervous"
It was this easy! There's a method for you! Must Read!
A practical manual on how to handle all types of everyday situations!
If you read this, you too can radiate confidence!

5.SummaryEnglish: Those who stay up until 25:00 to watch "Petit SEKAI" probably already knew this, but 25:00 is truly a fascinating period of time. Watching anime on real-time, gourmet food photos that suddenly appear on your SNS timeline, and cozy late-night radio broadcasts. Mizuki who was fascinated by the magic of 25:00 went and proposed something to the other members of 25-ji...

6.SummaryEnglish: Saki's hobby is: watching fashion and make-up videos. But there's no way that she could be satisfied just by watching, which is why she's looking for a chance to show off her technique.

7.SummaryEnglish: Ding-Dong-Ding-Dong ♪ Calling the following students: Tenma Tsukasa from Class 2-A, Kamishiro Rui from Class 2-B. Please come to the staff room immediately. We have a few questions regarding the large personal belonging you have left behind on the school's rooftop. Ding-Dong-Ding-Dong ♪

8.TitleEnglish: Let's Go Viral! MORE MORE JUMP!
8.SummaryEnglish: We want more people to see our idol activities!" With that in mind, MORE MORE JUMP! started to broadcast their activities on a daily basis. However, the number of views they got didn't increase as expected. During this situation, what Airi suggested was...!
